title: Dynamic Elements Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 10 Dynamic sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/WN0E6QWCcpk


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS 


Texture Resolutions:


● Electric 01_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Electric 02_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Energy_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Explosion_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Fire 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Fire 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Smoke 01_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Smoke 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Smoke 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Smoke 04_#[512,288].png 2048x1296


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
